title: Baking Competition
story: It is not only at the North Pole that the debate about the best type of cookie is a hot topic. Even in our kitchens, they become a topic of conversation (even though vanilla crescents are objectively the best).
shortstory: Cookies are not just a topic at the North Pole.
content: Elias (#1), Fiona (#2), Greta (#3) and Hannes (#4) are baking cookies for Christmas. Each of them has a different cookie favorite: Gingerbread, cinnamon stars, vanilla crescents or speculoos. Everyone bakes a different number of cookies (12, 15, 18 or 20). Find out who likes which cookie and how many cookies each person has baked. The clues are at the station.
points: Enter the number of cookies baked in the corresponding #field.
